description:
\i[10]: Determines chance to hit with non-fields. Chance to critical = \i[10] - \i[11].
\i[11]: Determines chance to evade with non-fields. Chance to dodge = \i[11] - \i[10]. Attacks from behind ignores all \i[11].

description:
\i[65]: To gain stacks of \i[65], move with certain equipments. Each \i[65] adds 5% \i[11]. All \i[65] resets at turn start.

description:

\i[39]: All non-field \i[5] will decrease \i[39] to 0 before \i[3]. All non-field \i[5] less than 10% of total \i[39] are decreased to 0.
name: Aloia's Notes 3

description:
Items: To use items in battle they must be equipped. Items are equipped on the "slots" of body armor or item bags.
Skills: \i[7] are skills based on the "weapon" equipment slot. \i[8] are skills based on the "class" equipment slot.
name: Aloia's Notes 4

description:
Turn Order: The first turn order is always round-robin and proceeding turns are determined by \i[4].
Status Paging: The battle status window can be paged using "Q and W", during targeting, or "mouse scroll", when not.
